fr.sii.ogham.testing.extension.junit.email

Class RandomPortGreenMailRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icegreen.greenmail.configuration.ConfiguredGreenMail
      • com.icegreen.greenmail.util.GreenMailProxy
        • com.icegreen.greenmail.junit4.GreenMailRule
          • fr.sii.ogham.testing.extension.junit.email.RandomPortGreenMailRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.icegreen.greenmail.base.GreenMailOperations, org.junit.rules.MethodRule, org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class RandomPortGreenMailRule
extends com.icegreen.greenmail.junit4.GreenMailRule
    Just an extension for GreenMailRule to handle random port instead of fixed port.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

      Constructor and Description

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomPortGreenMailRule

        public RandomPortGreenMailRule()
        Initialize the rule for the SMTP protocol only (random port).

      • RandomPortGreenMailRule

        public RandomPortGreenMailRule(String... protocols)
        Initialize the rule for the provided protocols (random port for each protocol). The random port range is [RandomPortUtils.PORT_RANGE_MIN, RandomPortUtils.PORT_RANGE_MAX].
        Parameters:
        protocols - the list of protocols to start

      • RandomPortGreenMailRule

        public RandomPortGreenMailRule(int maxPort,
                               String... protocols)
        Initialize the rule for the provided protocols (random port for each protocol). The random port range is [RandomPortUtils.PORT_RANGE_MIN, maxPort].
        Parameters:
        maxPort - the maximum port
        protocols - the list of protocols to start

      • RandomPortGreenMailRule

        public RandomPortGreenMailRule(int minPort,
                               int maxPort,
                               String... protocols)
        Initialize the rule for the provided protocols (random port for each protocol). The random port range is [minPort, maxPort].
        Parameters:
        minPort - the minimum port
        maxPort - the maximum port
        protocols - the list of protocols to start
